kit.leader_skill: "Super Bosses" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Majestic Smash
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy

ultra_super_attack.name: Majestic Lava
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; Raises Extreme Class allies' DEF by 30% for 1 turn

passive_skill.name: Trump Card of Universe 3
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Final Trump Card" or "Super Bosses" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Ki +3, ATK & DEF 130% up and foresees enemy's Super Attack for 3 turns; (Once) Ki +3; (Once) ATK & DEF 130% up; (Once) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR excluded) to STR Ki Spheres; When HP is 30% or more: Ki +3; Damage reduction rate 30% up; 3 or more STR Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; 5 or more STR Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional Super Attack; As the 1st attacker in a turn: ATK & DEF 130% up; Damage reduction rate 30% up; As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn: High chance of launching an additional Super Attack; Attacks are effective against all Types; ATK & DEF 30% up when attacking with 12 or more Ki
